snippet: Mr. Skvorecky left Czechoslovakia for a teaching position in Toronto after Prague Spring was crushed.
abstract: Josef Skvorecky, renowned Czech author who drew on his experiences under the Nazis and the Communists to write fiction that captured the corruptions and humiliations of the 20th century, dies at age 87.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Skvorecky left Czechoslovakia for a teaching position in Toronto after Prague Spring was crushed.

headline.seo: Josef Skvorecky, Czech-Born Writer, Dies at 87
headline.main: Josef Skvorecky, Czech-Born Writer Oppressed by Right and Left, Dies at 87
headline.print_headline: Josef Skvorecky, Czech-Born Writer Oppressed by Right and Left, Dies at 87
